import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Header from '../../components/header/Header' import NavList from '../../components/home/left-side/NavList' import InfiniteList from '../../components/util/InfiniteList' import { getPosts } from '../../store/actions/postAction' import styles from './Saved.module.css' export const Saved = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {auth, post} = useSelector(state=>state) useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getPosts(auth)) },[auth.user._id]) return (
{isDesktop &&
}
{post.loading?
: {/* {post.posts.length>0?post.posts.map(post=>( )) :

) }
